Title: Creates the New York health benefit and cost commission; repealer
Summary: Creates the New York health benefit and cost commission to review and report on utilization rates, public and patient health effects, and impact on premiums and access to health care and health coverage of all existing and proposed mandated health benefits.
LawCode: Add ยง3221-a, rpld ยง213, Ins L; add ยง52-a, Leg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law and the legislative law, in relation to creating the New York health benefit and cost commission; and to repeal section 213 of the insurance law relating thereto
